There are many dog sledding tours and operators in the Swiss Alps, so it can be difficult to choose which one is best. Here are a few recommended operators that offer dog sledding tours:

1. Husky-Tours in Grindelwald: This operator offers dog sledding tours in the stunning mountains around Grindelwald, with tours ranging from 1 hour to full-day experiences.

2. White Elements in Arosa: This operator offers a variety of winter activities, including dog sledding tours through the snowy landscapes of Arosa.

3. Engadin Dogsled in Pontresina: This operator offers dog sledding tours through the Engadin Valley, with stunning views of the surrounding mountains.

4. Grimentz Dogsledding in Grimentz: This operator offers dog sledding tours in the Val d'Anniviers region, giving you the chance to experience the natural beauty of the Swiss Alps.

5. Evolène Dogsledding in Evolène: This operator offers dog sledding tours in the heart of the Valais region, with an emphasis on sustainability and respect for the environment.

These operators are known for providing high-quality tours and experiences, while also treating their dogs humanely and providing them with proper care. You can also check online reviews and ask for recommendations from locals to help you choose the best operator for your needs.
